title: Project Kickoff Meeting
description: A project manager is leading the official kickoff meeting for a new implementation project.

tasks.description: Prepare and distribute a kickoff meeting agenda.
tasks.expected_outcome: Project manager creates a clear agenda covering introductions, project goals, roles, and timeline.

tasks.description: Lead the kickoff meeting, presenting the project plan and establishing communication protocols.
tasks.expected_outcome: Project manager successfully aligns all stakeholders and sets expectations.

tasks.description: Follow up with meeting minutes and action items.
tasks.expected_outcome: Project manager documents the meeting outcomes and assigned tasks.
